file_results.false_positive_reason: The flagged line (os.system('rm -vrf ./build ./dist ./*.pyc ./*.tgz ./*.egg-info')) is part of a custom setuptools Command class (CleanCommand) intended to clean up build artifacts generated during packaging and development. This is a common and standard practice in Python packaging scripts (setup.py) to help developers remove temporary files and directories. The command only removes files and directories related to the build process within the project directory and does not target user data or system files. There is no evidence of malicious intent or behavior in the code.

detection_points.full_match: * This package is executing OS commands in the setup.py file at ropwr-1.1.0/setup.py:28
